SELECT A.MB_NO, DATE_FORMAT(A.ODR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ODR_DT, B.USER_ID FROM TB_ODR100 A,TB_USER100 B WHERE A.MB_NO = B.MB_NO ORDER BY ODR_DT DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT A.GDS_CD, A.GDS_REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) as cnt, B.GDS_NM, B.BRAND_NM, B.GDS_SCLASS_CD, B.GDS_MCLASS_CD, C.GDS_PRICE, C.IMG1 AS RImg1 FROM TB_GDS210 A, TB_GDS100 B, TB_GDS200 C WHERE A.GDS_CD = B.GDS_CD AND A.GDS_CD = C.GDS_CD GROUP BY GDS_CD ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT (select right(A.GDS_CD,'2')) as GDS_CD, B.GDS_NM, B.BRAND_NM, B.GDS_SCLASS_CD, B.GDS_MCLASS_CD, C.GDS_PRICE, C.IMG1 AS RImg1 FROM TB_GDS210 A, TB_GDS100 B, TB_GDS200 C WHERE A.GDS_CD = B.GDS_CD AND A.GDS_CD = C.GDS_CD ORDER BY GDS_CD DESC LIMIT 12
SELECT NOTIC_NO,SUB FROM TB_NOTIC100 ORDER BY NOTIC_NO DESC LIMIT 5;
